# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item comes with a unique blend of quality and functionality designed to enhance your daily experience. Considering its unparalleled features and craftsmanship, I propose a special introductory price of $85 for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your lifestyle with an item that truly stands out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
